name: Amilin TV
overview: Recognized as the prime mover of Islamic Finance News TV, Amilin TV has a viewership from up to 100 countries worldwide and is regarded as the primary source for Islamic Financial news videos online. Unrivaled in Islamic Finance, OIC Economy and Halal Industry, Amilin TV is at the forefront of the new economy, empowering viewers with the latest Islamic Finance news headlines and news of major events that shape your business day ahead. Amilin TV provides market professional with the latest news and market analysis on Islamic Capital Market, Islamic Interbank Benchmark Rate, LIBOR, Sukuk, Islamic Equities and others. With a strategic partnership between the global financial news providers, Amilin TV will be looked upon as a turning point for the Islamic Finance Industry to move to the next level. Our vision is to become the mainstream financial media. Any country aiming to become the global hub in Islamic Economy need this kind of business media as marketing arm to promote and propagate their Islamic Finance agenda to the world.

milestones.description: Official Launching of Amilin TV at World Islamic Banking Conference in Singapore
milestones.source_description: Amilin Global Launches Online Islamic Finance News TV
